column5: Enjoy a private room with a comfortable, king-sized bed and a guest bathroom just down the hallway.    Your room is separated from the Master, providing privacy when needed. Only a 15-minute drive from downtown Fort Worth, Stockyards, and Magnolia. We're off of I-20 so you'll be near TCU, Hulen Mall, and plenty of restaurants/shopping!  We have one hypoallergenic puppy named Ballot. He's a friendly little guy but we can be sure to keep him out of your way, too.
column8: The Cowtown Room - Private, Cozy Bedroom
